title: contract creation transaction is returning txhash instead of address of created contract
body:
Geth
Version: 0.9.35
Git Commit: 45618d5f6bd1cd5e046fe0f0e07746b3af4cf55a
Protocol Versions: [61 60]
Network Id: 0
Go Version: go1.4.2

private chain, eth_sendTransaction to create a new contract.
contract creation transaction is returning txhash instead of address of created contract
There will be a automatic async way to get the contract address automatically: see https://github.com/ethereum/web3.js/pull/255
